title: Counting charactrers
description:
You are to implement the following function: 
void counting(string  S, int & aphabeticNum, int & numericNum);
 
This function counts the number of alphabetic and numeric characters in the input string S, and assigns the results to aphabeticNum and numericNum.  
For example, if S is “abc#12*", then aphabeticNum=3, numericNum=2。

The main() function should not be submitted.
author: 程序设计II Chapter 12 File Input and Output
